terms_page.title: Terms of Use
terms_page.snackbar: You must agree to all terms.
terms_page.terms_of_service: Agree to the Terms of Service (Required)
terms_page.privacy_policy_details:
The HelloWorld service (hereinafter referred to as 'Service') is provided by the development team (hereinafter referred to as 'Team'). The Team values the protection of personal information and provides the following guidelines regarding the processing of personal data collected during the use of the Service.

1. Personal Information Collected
- Personal information collected during registration: KakaoTalk account information, nickname
- Additional personal information collected: Profile picture, My Team information, etc.

2. Purpose of Processing Personal Information
- Providing services and managing members
- Preventing fraudulent activities and improving the Service
- Collecting and analyzing service usage statistics

3. Retention and Processing Period of Personal Information
- Personal information is processed and retained within the period stipulated by law.
- Personal information is deleted within 90 days after service use ends.

4. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
- Personal information is not provided to third parties without the member’s consent.

5. Methods of Protecting Personal Information
- The Team applies various security technologies to protect personal information.

6. Rights and Obligations of Members
- Members can view, modify, or delete their personal information at any time and exercise their rights regarding the processing of personal data.

7. Disposal of Personal Information
- Once the purpose of processing personal information is achieved, it is immediately disposed of.
terms_page.terms_of_service_details:
These terms define the conditions of use of the HelloWorld service (hereinafter referred to as 'Service') and outline the rights and obligations between the Service provider and its members.

1. Provision of Service
- The HelloWorld Service provides various features and content to its members, and its use is subject to these terms.

2. Member Obligations
- Members must not infringe on the rights of others or interfere with the normal operation of the Service.
- Engaging in illegal or criminal activities that harm the Service may result in restrictions on service use.

3. Service Use Restrictions
- If fraudulent activities or violations of the terms are detected, the Team may restrict the use of the Service or suspend the member’s account.

4. Protection of Personal Information
- Personal information collected during Service use is processed according to the Team’s Privacy Policy, and members may request modifications or deletions at any time.

5. Service Changes and Discontinuation
- The Team may modify or discontinue the Service due to technical issues or operational needs.

6. Changes to the Terms
- The Team may modify these terms for service improvements or changes in the law. The revised terms take effect after notification.

7. Disclaimer
- The Team is not legally responsible for issues arising from the use of the Service, and members bear full responsibility for any consequences during Service use.

8. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
- These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea, and disputes related to Service use shall be resolved in the court of the Team’s jurisdiction.

hello_message:
Hello! I'm your chatbot 😀 

To get started, press the button below or type a message. 

Please note that the information provided by AI may not be accurate and should be used for reference only.
choose_question:
Please choose your inquiry. 

To return to the start, type 'Start'.
answer_message:
I will answer about {content}. 
For additional inquiries, please enter your message. 
To return to the start, type '{start_button}'.
intro: Hello, I am Yunseo, a cross-platform developer.
projectA: Project A: Shopping App Development with Flutter
projectB: Project B: Machine Learning-Based Recommendation System

details.detail1: Improved app performance by identifying and fixing bugs, resulting in a 15% increase in app speed.
details.detail2: Contributed to the successful implementation of a new feature, leading to a 20% increase in user engagement.
details.detail3: Enhanced app stability by conducting thorough testing and resolving critical issues, reducing crashes by 25%.

details.detail1: Participated in research on machine learning algorithms.
details.detail2: Developed a mobile app as part of a senior project, which was awarded the best project in the class.
details.detail3: Completed coursework in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering with top grades.

projectA.title: Project A: Shopping App Development with Flutter
projectA.description: Developed a shopping app with a user-friendly UI. Key features include a shopping cart, order tracking, and user review system.
projectA.contribution: Contribution: Frontend and backend development, API integration

projectB.title: Project B: Machine Learning-based Recommendation System
projectB.description: Developed a system that provides personalized recommendations by analyzing user behavior. Conducted data analysis and model training.
projectB.contribution: Contribution: Data preprocessing, model training and evaluation, results analysis
